invocation.name: Labor of Chuchlean I
invocation.description: Increases a single artistic skill until the priest next sleeps, raising it by one fifth the invocation roll.

invocation.name: Vlasta Tears I
invocation.description: Causes the target's eyes to weep uncontrollably, giving them a penalty to all actions requiring sight equal to -2 per 5 rolled for the next 2 minutes.

invocation.name: Bellow of the Aklash II
invocation.description: Priest's breath is foul and causes nausea to all those within range, giving them -2 per 5 rolled for the next two minutes.
